job.title: Senior Java Software Engineer
job.description:
NOTE: Any visa fine but PASSPORT Must.

 

Immediate Openings Full Stack JAVA Developer for Portland, OR (Any visa fine) 

Hello,

I Hope you are doing great. Please find the below Job Descriptions and revert me with a suitable resume.

Job Title: Full Stack JAVA Developer

Location: Portland, OR

Duration: Contract

Skills:

  • 7-10 years workable
  • J2EE developer with reactJS, Node JS, Spring Boot, AWS, CSS ,Java Script, API
  • Type Script
  • Working experience on Lambda
  • Must have debugging skills.

 

 

 

Thanks & Regards,
